amendment.description: To designate the areas affected by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita as HUBZones and to waive the Small Business Competitive Demonstration Program Act of 1988 for the areas affected by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3627 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3627 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S3567; text: CR S3567) To designate the areas affected by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita as HUBZones and to waive the Small Business Competitive Demonstration Program Act of 1988 for the areas affected by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3627 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3627 proposed by Senator Vitter.
